title: Sans serif font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122052im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled_4130.png)

Can someone tell me what is the name of the font ?

Thank you

Font: 

 Dosis Light 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122052/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: C.vLd

comments.content: **[Dosis Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122052/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Dosis%20Light%20-%20Regular&fid=74237ecf2f4598aa7e21c30c45cbdcd4&fsize=60&text=homage%20istanbul&fit=1)** by EdgarTolentino, PabloImpallari, IginoMarini [2011], part of Google Web Fonts
